Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • pract2.Circle
  • public class Circle
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Circle: defines a circle of a given radius, color, center position, with the following functionalities.
    Version:
    Academic year 2021/2022
    Author:
    IIP

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Circle()
      Create a Circle of radius 50, black and center in (100,100).

      Create a Circle of radius r, color c and center in (cx,cy).
